column1: Uchi////Gyutan ($7): 1/5 Now this irked me. Weirdly cut piece of beef tongue on a balled up piece of rice with some lime zest on top. Not bad
column3: especially for the price. I've seen pieces of this same sushi done very differently
column4: so I feel like they skimped out on the sake social servings
column5: which doesn't feel justified to me as I'm paying $3.50 for a piece of meat on rice.
